attributes.action: Ban Microsoft's Internet Explorer in the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details:
If you have a heart you will use Chrome, Firefox, even Edge if you must continue helping Microsoft!

IE is hated by developers, geeks and anyone who calls themselves technologically competent.

Even the popular website YouTube, owned by the "kings of the internet" Google, have abandoned most versions of IE.

Just ask Google: https://goo.gl/J8HJAZ
attributes.background: Microsoft's Internet Explorer (IE) is a web browser created by the Microsoft Corporation. This web browser is a developer's worst nightmare! It's slow, horrible and refuses to function properly with modern websites.
